title: Sandstorm Ekko looks terrible...who agrees?
body:
http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--WB4iACuCEc/VVOlvzIOV_I/AAAAAAAAp3c/RWuGuL_-y40/s1600/ekko1.jpg

http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BY988OYr1iM/VVOlwtihCEI/AAAAAAAAp3k/IEoIYdtVQhY/s1600/ekko1turn.jpg

I guess the skin would be saved if it played Darude - Sandstorm for the duration of his ultimate.

But then all chat will be assaulted with "song name?!!??"
